price: О Веровесниче, заиста смо те послали као сведока и као доносиоца радосних вести и као опомињача,
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلنَّبِيُّ إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ شَٰهِدٗا وَمُبَشِّرٗا وَنَذِيرٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā al-nabiyu innā arsalnāka shāhidan wamubashiran wanadhīran
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
